key_features: Able to be washed without damage
Brand and weight printed on ends
ai_description: Two vibrant blue dumbbells with a smooth, coated finish that appears to be neoprene or vinyl. Each dumbbell features hexagonal ends painted in the same blue color, with crisp white lettering displaying the brand 'KAKSS' and weight '4 KG'. The dumbbells are shown both in a clean studio setting on a white surface and in a gym environment on a speckled floor, showcasing their professional appearance. The hexagonal design prevents rolling and provides stability during exercises.
manual: Professionally crafted kettlebell made from 100% pure cast iron with no material mixing, delivering long-term durability and accurate weight as per international standards. The smooth, seamless cast-iron handle offers a secure, comfortable grip, while the flat, well-balanced base ensures superior ground stability, controlled movements, and safe strength training for both beginners and advanced athletes
